mapper.select: SELECT t.id AS id,t.user_id AS userId,ty.id AS textTypeId,ty.type_name AS textTypeName,t.photo_preview, t.comment_count,t.like_count,t.title,t.content,t.preview,t.create_time,t.update_time,t.read_count FROM text t LEFT JOIN text_type ty ON t.text_type_id=ty.id ORDER BY create_time DESC
SELECT id AS userId,account_id AS accountId,nickname,photo_str,word_count,collection_like_count FROM user ORDER BY lately_up_time DESC
SELECT id AS userId,nickname,photo_url FROM user WHERE id=#{userId} LIMIT 1
